ygData.subject: Hell 3?  What Hell 3?
ygData.msgSnippet: Although it pains me to say it, I have found SoW to be extremely useful lately... Sitting in my normal solo spot just South of the FV giant camp, I came upon a
ygData.messageBody:
Although it pains me to say it, I have found SoW to be extremely useful
lately...
Sitting in my normal solo spot just South of the FV giant camp, I came upon
a nifty idea:
Instead of me using Chains (which seems to have a really silly resist rate
vs blues sometimes) to slow my victim (drolvarg snarler or growler), and
have to spend my time rotating 3 songs which may or may not stick, why not
just get a SoW and drop Chains from the rotation while just juggling my 2
chants with my Tamborine?
*looks around for any VI employees*
It works so well that I can pull multiple doggies, find a nice spot to run
in a circle, and DoT the bejeezus outta them (my current record is 2
growlers and 1 snarler, non-stop without being hit once. Woulda been more,
but in an earlier pull a froggie shaman got into the mix :o/ )
All I do is run around and grab some pups, go back to my lil spot (using the
rocks as a marler for when to turn), aand begin juggling DoTs. When one
dies, I switch views, target another, then do it again, rinse and repeat
until all pups are dead. Just in case ye start runnin low on stamina, have
Jig mem'd ;o)

-=B=-
40.2
The Rathe
